pullrequest.title: Fix gz11 abi jobs by auto-detecting ubuntu distro

content.raw:
I think that the [failing build cause](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/ws/abi_checker/logs/ign-physics/X/log.txt/*view*/) it is related to the use of C\+\+17 features. We lack the logic of gz11 hook and compiler selection in the abi checker generic job for ignition and the problem is that we have it widespread among all ign-\*-compilation scripts. Options I see:

1. Refactor all logic to select gz11 branches, put it in a share place and reuse in -compilations and abicheck scripts.
2. Try to workaround the issue by setting the `export USE_GCC8=true` to be used in all abi-checkers. We could find a non desired side-effect although I think that the chances are low.

I did the second in `abi_gz11_jrivero` branch:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=6)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_physics-abichecker-any\_to\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/6/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/6/))
